edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.dh

Class SigmaDHProverInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.dh.SigmaDHProverInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaProverInput, ZKProverInput

    public class SigmaDHProverInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaProverInput
    Concrete implementation of SigmaProtocol input, used by the SigmaDHProver.

    In SigmaProtocolDH, the prover gets three GroupElements - h, u, v and a BigInteger w such that g^w = u and h^w = v.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Constructor Summary

      SigmaDHProverInput(GroupElement h, GroupElement u, GroupElement v, java.math.BigInteger w)
      Sets the prover's input values that satisfy g^w = u and h^w = v.
